name: test-token-contract
description: This is a test equity token contract to be deployed on the local Ganache testnet and the Rinkeby testnet. ## Get Started ### Setup Truffle Project ``` truffle init ``` ### Compiling the Truffle Project ``` truffle compile ``` ### Migrate the Truffle Project to Ganache Make the following adjustment in the `truffle-config.json` file: ```     development: {       host: "127.0.0.1",     // Localhost (default: none)       port: 7545,            // Standard Ethereum port (default: none)       network_id: "5777",       // Any network (default: none)       }, ``` Write the deployment script in the folder `migrations`. The migration file name should start with a number. I use to call it `2_deploy_contracts.js`.
